CustomField.description: Grievances, Complaint and Discipline Management: -Ensure all employees grievances and concern are dealt with in a consistent process and resolved promptly and with fairness. -Bridge employee relations e.g. feedback portal, whistleblowing etc -Dispute management -Handle staff disciplinary situations
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Grievances, Complaint and Discipline Management: -Ensure all employees grievances and concern are dealt with in a consistent process and resolved promptly and with fairness. -Bridge employee relations e.g. feedback portal, whistleblowing etc -Dispute management -Handle staff disciplinary situations
CustomField.label: Difficult Situation Mgmt [HR]
